text: The 15th Golden Melody Awards were held on 8 May 2004 outside the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei, Taiwan. Overseas guests included Korean artists, BoA, Kangta and TVXQ of SM Entertainment, Tata Young and Tsubasa Imai. Epoch Times.com BoA and Kangta are guests at 15th Golden Melody Awards 24 April 2004. Retrieved 2011-06-21 ==Summary== Jay Chou's fourth album Yeh Hui-mei, named after his mother, was awarded Best Mandarin Album. ==References== ==External links== * 15th Golden Melody Awards nominees * 15th Golden Melody Awards winners Golden Melody Awards Category:Golden Melody Awards Category:2004 music awards
title: 15th Golden Melody Awards
